    • Method Detail

      • readNetwork

        public FourStepSimulator readNetwork(FourStepProject project)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a FourStepSimulator for the given FourStepProject. This calls ReadNetwork.readNodes(avdta.project.Project) and ReadNetwork.readLinks(avdta.project.Project) and initializes the simulator (Network.initialize()). This also reads transit (ReadNetwork.readTransit(avdta.project.TransitProject) and personal vehicles (ReadDTANetwork.readVehicles(avdta.project.DTAProject)).
        Parameters:
        project - the FourStepProject
        Returns:
        the created FourStepSimulator
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file cannot be accessed
